DataElement.preferredName: Musculoskeletal Disease Other Personal Medical History Descriptive Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text to describe any musculoskeletal disease diagnosed by a physician within a patient that is different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Musculoskeletal Disease Other Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Having to do with muscles, bones, and cartilage._The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._ An account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Having to do with muscles, bones, and cartilage.:A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to the muscles and skeleton.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The text that provides a description of a topic.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
